definition: to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)

sentences.chinese: 這種更改無法被撤消和復原。

sentences.english: Modifications have been made to thee-gold Account User Agreement.
sentences.chinese: 已作了更改，以電子黃金賬戶的用戶協議。

sentences.english: Reevaluate the operation task of the operators and do not cause changes to the process flow.
sentences.chinese: 重新平衡操作工的作業含量，對過程流程不引起更改。

sentences.english: Components that are changed together should be grouped into one module.
sentences.chinese: 應該將一起進行更改的組件分組到一個模塊中。

sentences.english: Optimistic locking, where a record is locked only when changes are committed to the database.
sentences.chinese: 樂觀的鎖定，只當數據庫發生更改時鎖定記錄。

sentences.english: To do this, you essentially need a rollback script for every change.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，實際上每個更改都需要一個回滾腳本。

sentences.english: Be sure to re-enable synchronization after you complete the changes.
sentences.chinese: 在完成更改之後，您要確保重新激活同步化功能。

sentences.english: Put the clock on one hour when the time changes.
sentences.chinese: 更改時制後，把鍾撥快一個小時。

sentences.english: Do not change anything in this initial sample.
sentences.chinese: 不要更改這個初始樣本中的任何東西。

sentences.english: You cannot change thhe victim's time of death, however soon it may be.
sentences.chinese: 但無論怎樣更改，死亡時間不變。

sentences.english: This reduces the set of workspace changes shown in the synchronization wizard.
sentences.chinese: 這可以減小同步嚮導中顯示的工作空間更改量。

sentences.english: Bookmarks have changed on disk and are being reloaded.
sentences.chinese: 已經在磁盤上更改了書籤，正在被重新裝入。

sentences.english: Governance of changes and versions for services are crude and unrefined
sentences.chinese: 服務的更改和版本治理非常粗糙並且未定義。

sentences.english: You need to restart Application Server to pick up this change.
sentences.chinese: 您需要重新啓動應用服務器才能使此更改生效。

sentences.english: You may have to change the password for these logins accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 因此，您可能需要更改這些登錄的密碼。

sentences.english: Marshaling the structure can transform the layout and alter the offset.
sentences.chinese: 封送結構可轉換佈局並更改偏移量。

definition: to change (sth)/to alter (sth)/to change over (to sth else)
to replace (a worn-out tire etc)/to change (one's address etc)
to convert/to turn into (sth else)/to adapt (a story to another medium)
to appoint/to assign/to indicate clearly and with certainty/designated
to become invalid/to cancel/to delete/to nullify
